Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Prélude in F major

1891 · Threlfall and Norris II/15

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Rachmaninoff later revised this prélude for cello and piano (op. 2 no. 1).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
